purpleculture_pinyin:
biǎn
to diminish; to demote; to reduce or devaluate; to disparage; to censure; to depreciate
уменьшить; понизить в должности; снизить или обесценить; принижать; порицать; обесценить

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 贬)
Antonyms: 褒
Ideographic: To devalue 乏 currency 貝
purpleculture_examples:
貶值 [ biǎn zhí ]: to become devaluated; to devaluate; to depreciate
貶低 [ biǎn dī ]: to belittle; to disparage; to play down; to demean; to degrade; to devalue
貶斥 [ biǎn chì ]: to demote; to denounce
貶義 [ biǎn yì ]: derogatory sense; negative connotation

    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
    • 乏 [ fá ] poor; short, lacking; tired
heisig_chinese_memo: Investors are weary about stocks being devalued because they will lose all their shells.
Ru_Notes: На самом деле основное чтение けな.す, в KANJIDIC ошибка. おと.す почти никогда не используется.

Ru_trainchinese:
biǎn: (глаг) (книжн.) понижать в должности; принижать, умалять
biǎn: (глаг) уменьшать, снижать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the poor (乏) shellfish (貝) is scorned
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The shellfish is weary that people may not devalue shellfish unless the reputation is bad so he poisons people who eat shellfish to spread the belief that shellfish can be dangerous to eat.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to " Lack " sound. The original meaning is derogation and reduction. "Said Wen": "Derogation, damage. Cong Bei Congwan." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Twenty-one Years of Xi Gong: "Repairing the city, degrading food and saving money, and persuading the division, this is also the work." "Book of the Later Han. "The Biography of Yuan Shao Liu Biao": "(Han) Fu Yi is still deeply suspicious of (Yuan) Shao. Every time the army departs, he wants to be separated."

" Demo " means demotion or demotion. "Zihui": "Relegated, banished." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Zhao Min": "Kong fills up restlessly, I am a kong demotion." Mao Chuan: "Demotion, team also." "Mencius. "Guozixia": "If you don't have a court, you will demote your nobility; if you don't have a court, you will cut your land; if you don't have a court, you will move your six divisions."

" Depreciation " also means giving a low evaluation, as opposed to " praise ." Such as "Spring and Autumn Valley Liang Chuan. The Eleventh Year of Huan Gong: "Song people, Song Gong also. Who is the person? Degraded." "Huainanzi. Synopsis: "To praise the prosperity of the first sage, and to demote the political politics of the last days."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to " Lack " sound. The original meaning is derogation and reduction.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「乏」聲。本義是減損、減少。《說文》：「貶，損也。从貝从乏。」如《左傳．僖公二十一年》：「脩城郭，貶食省用，務穡勸分，此其務也。」《後漢書．袁紹劉表列傳》：「（韓）馥意猶深疑於（袁）紹，每貶節軍糧，欲使離散。」

　　「貶」表示降級、降職。《字彙》：「貶，謫也。」如《詩．大雅．召旻》：「孔填不寧，我位孔貶。」毛傳：「貶，隊也。」《孟子．告子下》：「一不朝，則貶其爵；再不朝，則削其地；三不朝，則六師移之。」

　　「貶」也表示給予低的評價，與「褒」相對。如《春秋穀梁傳．桓公十一年》：「宋人者，宋公也。其曰人何也？貶之也。」《淮南子．要略》：「以褒先聖之隆盛，而貶末世之曲政也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「乏」聲。本義是減損、減少。

Chinese: Investors are weary about stocks being devalued because they will lose all their shells.
Meaning: devalue
Hanzi: 贬
Story: The shellfish is weary that people may not devalue shellfish unless the reputation is bad so he poisons people who eat shellfish to spread the belief that shellfish can be dangerous to eat.
Kind: traditional

從「 貝 」，「 乏 」聲。本義是減損、減少。《說文》：「貶，損也。从貝从乏。」如《左傳．僖公二十一年》：「脩城郭，貶食省用，務穡勸分，此其務也。」《後漢書．袁紹劉表列傳》：「（韓）馥意猶深疑於（袁）紹，每貶節軍糧，欲使離散。」 「 貶 」表示降級、降職。《字彙》：「貶，謫也。」如《詩．大雅．召旻》：「孔填不寧，我位孔貶。」毛傳：「貶，隊也。」《孟子．告子下》：「一不朝，則貶其爵；再不朝，則削其地；三不朝，則六師移之。」 「 貶 」也表示給予低的評價，與「 褒 」相對。如《春秋穀梁傳．桓公十一年》：「宋人者，宋公也。其曰人何也？貶之也。」《淮南子．要略》：「以褒先聖之隆盛，而貶末世之曲政也。」

"Zihui": "Relegated, banished." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Zhao Min": "Kong fills up restlessly, I am a kong demotion." Mao Chuan: "Demotion, team also." "Mencius. 貶字的基本解释

貶
biǎn
见“贬”。

貶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biǎn］
［《廣韻》方斂切，上琰，幫。］
“贬1”的繁体字。“辨3”的被通假字。“辯3”的被通假字。
(1)减少；缺少。
(2)降职。
(3)给予低的评价。跟“褒”相对。
(4)抑退；谦退。
(5)方言。犹别。揣，插。

貶字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　貶； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1206第20
【廣韻】方斂切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】悲檢切，?音疺。【說文】損也。【公羊傳·隱二年】何以不氏貶。【註】貶，猶損也。【杜預·春秋序】《春秋》雖以一字爲褒貶。　又【詩·大雅】我位孔貶。【傳】貶，墜也。　又【玉篇】減也。　又【增韻】謫也，抑也。　又【集韻】補范切，音覂。義同。　又通作辯。【周禮·秋官·士師】若邦凶荒，則以荒辯之灋治之。【註】辯，當爲貶。遭飢荒，則?罰，國事有所貶損，作權時灋也。　又通作辨。【禮·玉藻】立容辨。【註】辨，讀爲貶。自貶?，謂罄折也。　又【集韻】扶法切，音乏。【類篇】射者所蔽。

貶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
貶字的起名意思

暂无。

derogatory
biǎn
See "depreciation".
derogatory
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biǎn］
["Guangyun" Fang Lianqie, Shangyan, help. ]
The traditional characters of "說1". "Bian 3" was passed false characters. "Bian 3" was passed falsely.
(1) Decrease; lack.
(2) Demotion.
(3) Give a low evaluation. Contrast with "praise".
(4) Retreat; Retreat modestly.
(5) Dialects. Don't. Guess, insert.
derogatory
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　 Derogation; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1206 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Fang Lianqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Sad and cut,? Yin 疺. [Said the text] Loss also. [Gongyang Biography·Hidden Years] Why not be demoted. [Note] Depreciation is still a loss. [Du Yu·Chun Qiu Preface] Although "Chun Qiu" is praised and criticized by one word.　[Poetry·Daya] I'm a condemned person. [Biography] Depreciation, fall also.　[Jade articles] Minus again.　 [Zeng Yun] To ban it, to suppress it.　[Jiyun] Complement Fanqie, with sound. The same meaning.　It's another argument. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Judge】If the country is fierce and famine, then it will be ruled by famine and argument. [Note] Argument, as derogation. If you suffer from famine, you will be punished, and national affairs will be degraded.　It's also easy to distinguish. 【Li·Yuzao】Distinguish the standing capacity. [Note] Distinguish, read as derogatory. Self-derogation?　[Jiyun] Helping the law and cutting, the sound is lacking. [Classes] Covered by the shooter.
